TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Bukai, title = Bukai, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bukai} }

S.FORM: = Bukai = Gaga mniq Nantowseyn Jnaysyang ka alang Bukai. 250 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 1,057 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 96% niqan 1,012 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 4% niqan 45 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Bunun 91%, Tayal 2%, Amis 1%, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq 1%. Pusu nniqan alang Mniq nyusan Nato o Tg2 egu ka seejiq alang Bukai tg1 paru o alang Rwona . Nniqan alang Nyusan Nanto nsgan Jnay alnag Fac . Gasuc nniqan Alang hraan hidaw hiya o sslian qsiya Bukai, gqiyan hidaw hiya o kssiyaw keelug qhuni Bukai, nniqan yayung mdudul kiya, niqan ciway saph pyasan ka ruwan alang hiya. Lnglingay tiri Pusu mniq ssiyaw yayaung ka dxgal alang nii, kana knjisan dgiyaq nii o 800mm. Pkkla patas ppanun Mgrig rulu: Taypey>Elug klwaan tg3> Cungto Cyawriyotaw>Elug127>Taycung Nanto kbiyax rulu elug>Ciyawriyotaw Cawtung63Ciya>To 2> Elug Cungcng>Elug Ciyawkwang>Elug Yufu>To8>Elug yuping>Tay14>Elug Nanhwan>Elug Nanan>Elug Cungcgn>To71>Dhuq. Sjiqan klgan nealang Bunun. Djiyun kari Kari Bunun ni Tlu. Pnaah alang Nniqan daya dgiyaq Cwocetasan ka seejiq alang Bukai seuxal, daya hraan hidaw stroganoff kika yayung Kacesi ni yuyung mdudul, kana niqan tru alang, saw alang Kukus, Panapara, Pirawu. Yasa mniq alang Bukai o pntaqan bgurah dxgal snluan dha elug qluli qsiya muda qsiya qpahan ni qmpahan slaq ka seejiq nihung, yasa musa keegu ka angal dha pnegalan dha, kika mniq saw hngkawas 15 do mdudul tnhjil alang breenux da, asi dhuq hngkawas 18 do mnhdu thjil alang breenux kana da. Tmhangan seejiq nihung o Bukai, dungus na o "以武犯界", yasa naqih bi bhangan ka hangan nii ni dhuq saw bukuy Kwanfu o priyux hangan saw alang Fac dungan, paru bi ka dxgal Wanfung ni Cungcgn sbiyaw han. Mniq kari Bunun o, pusu hangan alang dha o Bukai, dungus na o muru saw hnang, tnhjil alang breenux ka seejiq Se seuxal o, qtaan saw babaw ssiyaw yayung, ana inu nniqan saw buga hngak kndadax truma hagay miyah babaw qsiya, kika niqan hnang boo-boo sa, kika dungus bi tmhangan dha nii o "Nniqan saw hnang buga qhjing sa". Pgkla patas rmigaw Pkkla patas alang nsgan Jnaysyang qmpah sapah klwaan:

= Bokai = Gaga mniq Nantowseyn Jnaysyang ka alang Bokai. 250 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 1,057 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 96% niqan 1,012 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 4% niqan 45 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Bonon 91%, Tayal 2%, Amis 1%, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq 1%. Poso nniqan alang Mniq nyosan Nato o Tg2 ego ka seejiq alang Bokai tg1 paro o alang Rwona . Nniqan alang Nyosan Nanto nsgan Jnay alnag Fac . Gasoc nniqan Alang hraan hidaw hiya o sslian qsiya Bokai, gqiyan hidaw hiya o kssiyaw keelog qhoni Bokai, nniqan yayong mdodol kiya, niqan ciway saph pyasan ka rowan alang hiya. Lnglingay tiri Poso mniq ssiyaw yayaong ka dxgal alang nii, kana knjisan dgiyaq nii o 800mm. Pkkla patas ppanon Mgrig rolo: Taypey>Elog klwaan tg3> Congto Cyawriyotaw>Elog127>Taycong Nanto kbiyax rolo elog>Ciyawriyotaw Cawtong63Ciya>To 2> Elog Congcng>Elog Ciyawkwang>Elog Yofo>To8>Elog yoping>Tay14>Elog Nanhwan>Elog Nanan>Elog Congcgn>To71>Dhoq. Sjiqan klgan nealang Bonon. Djiyon kari Kari Bonon ni Tlo. Pnaah alang Nniqan daya dgiyaq Cwocetasan ka seejiq alang Bokai seoxal, daya hraan hidaw stroganoff kika yayong Kacesi ni yoyong mdodol, kana niqan tro alang, saw alang Kokos, Panapara, Pirawo. Yasa mniq alang Bokai o pntaqan bgorah dxgal snloan dha elog qloli qsiya moda qsiya qpahan ni qmpahan slaq ka seejiq nihong, yasa mosa keego ka angal dha pnegalan dha, kika mniq saw hngkawas 15 do mdodol tnhjil alang breenox da, asi dhoq hngkawas 18 do mnhdo thjil alang breenox kana da. Tmhangan seejiq nihong o Bokai, dongos na o "以武犯界", yasa naqih bi bhangan ka hangan nii ni dhoq saw bokoy Kwanfo o priyox hangan saw alang Fac dongan, paro bi ka dxgal Wanfong ni Congcgn sbiyaw han. Mniq kari Bonon o, poso hangan alang dha o Bokai, dongos na o moro saw hnang, tnhjil alang breenox ka seejiq Se seoxal o, qtaan saw babaw ssiyaw yayong, ana ino nniqan saw boga hngak kndadax troma hagay miyah babaw qsiya, kika niqan hnang boo-boo sa, kika dongos bi tmhangan dha nii o "Nniqan saw hnang boga qhjing sa". Pgkla patas rmigaw Pkkla patas alang nsgan Jnaysyang qmpah sapah klwaan:
